title: Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, Unscented, 50 Count
descriptions:
**Title:**
Elevate Your Kitchen with Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, 50 Count

**Description:**
Transform your kitchen routine with the Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags, 13 Gallon, 50 Count. Each bag is crafted from tear-resistant white plastic, ensuring durability and easy disposal. With a Flex-tra strength design, these bags are built to last, providing the perfect fit for your kitchen waste needs.

**Key Features:**
- **50 Count:** Sufficient for your household needs, ensuring you have enough bags to keep your kitchen clean and tidy.
- **13 Gallon Capacity:** Designed to comfortably handle larger waste items, making it ideal for kitchen use.
- **Unscented:** Stay free from unwanted odors, maintaining a fresh and pleasant kitchen environment.
- **Tear-Resistant White Plastic:** Durable and easy to use, these bags are built to withstand common kitchen mishaps.
- **Red Drawstring Closure:** Securely seal your waste with a reliable red drawstring, ensuring no leaks or spills.
- **Alexa Voice Shopping:** Easily reorder when you're low on supplies, making it convenient to keep your kitchen in top condition.

Elevate your kitchen cleaning game with Amazon Basics Flextra Tall Kitchen Drawstring Trash Bags. Order now and enjoy the convenience and reliability of these high-quality trash bags!
